# Whist-Core
Rules implementation

## Run tests
```bash
# Create venv
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -U pip setuptools wheel

# Install with 'testing' extras
pip install -e .[testing]

# Run tests
python -m pytest
```
